alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:53PM CDT until June 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GALVESTON...SOUTHEASTERN FORT BEND...NORTHEASTERN BRAZORIA...SOUTHWESTERN CHAMBERS AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES... At 953 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Baytown to Central Southwest to Kendleton, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Pasadena, Pearland, League City, Baytown, southeastern Missouri City, Texas City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Alvin, Dickinson, South Houston, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Manvel, West Columbia and Beach City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
